Learning Goals

  • Learn the importance of Ajax and what it stands for
  • Learn about when to use Ajax
  • Connect Rails Controllers to Ajax
  • Practice using Ajax in a Rails app

01-no-ajax.body:
A world with no Ajax

  • We have to Reload pages to get Results back

Solution?

  • We want the browser to update the page without issuing a whole page reload
  • This would save time and look pretty.
